name: Hullmod installer
desc: Installs a hull modification in to a ship. It counts as a smod and only ships that have smod slots remaining can get one installed, additionaly only one alteration can be on a ship at a time. Rightclick to choose a ship.

name: Automation Alteration
desc: A unique single useage alteration that is able to convert a crewed ship in to an automated one.

name: Abyssal Conversion (Chronos)
desc: Converts an abyssal hull in to a crewed one, while also integrating a chronos core to keep the shipsystem working.

name: Abyssal Conversion (Cosmos)
desc: Converts an abyssal hull in to a crewed one, while also integrating a chronos core to keep the shipsystem working.
